    • loadPreviousIncorrectWordCache

      private void loadPreviousIncorrectWordCache()
      Finds current incorrect words and adds suggestions to them based off the previously cached incorrect words.

      Why not just load the previous incorrect words into the new incorrect words? First off, they may have been deleted, second, by matching words by their contents we can match words agnostic of their position and use the same suggestions for duplicate words as opposed to having to compute the same suggestions multiple times.

    • resetWrongWords

      private void resetWrongWords()
      Resets the list of incorrect words by moving the current list to the previous list.
